page.title: 13Felixstowe Dock. Freight.
page.content: Containers are found by computer, there is a number on the side of the contain- er,which the computer finds in its mem- ory and it is loaded on to a ship.The next thing to be agreed was for the po- rt to purchase some 60 acres of land from the Ministry of Defence.Felixstowe was the first port in the UK to utilise such a straddle carrier operation. The new terminal serves the Dooley and Walton terminals and is designed to pu- sh the share containers handled by rail to around 33%. Cargo handled through the port of Felixstowe year import export total tonnes tonnes tonnes 64 257,798 118,871 376,669 65 400,981 195,346 596,327 66 565,208 273,777 838,985 67 880,575 381,986 1,262,561 68 1,
